mapper.select: SELECT b.first_name as firstName, b.first_surname as firstSurname, b.second_surname as secondSurname, b.ci as ci, b.phone as phone, a.email as email, a.user_name as userName, a.birthdate as birthdate, c.number as number, c.street as street, c.zone as zone, c.city as city, c.country as country FROM client a, person b, address c WHERE b.person_id = a.person_id AND a.address_id = c.address_id AND a.client_id=#{idClient} AND a.status = 1
